abilities.name: Swing Dance
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Healing Steps
attacks.effect: You may discard as many cards as you like from your hand. If you do, remove that many damage counters from Ludicolo.

attacks.name: Circular Steps
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's), excluding Ludicolo.
